name: Acak - PianoBulae Work #Q3
description:
"Acak" (Disorder) is when the mind, the needs, the feeling, the heart and the body are not in sync and try to move on random paces. 

Piano Meets Granular Sampler in quarantine time. Part of a series entitled “PianoBulae Works”. Constructed entirely from fragments of a solo improvisation on an upright acoustic piano, recorded in 2016 and later manipulated on 2018 by granular sampler trough the eurorack system. This particular one imitates a specific motive in balinese gamelan music, on a piano..

All visuals are made in quarantine time
